attributes.action: Increase salaries for teachers to reward their hard work and encourage talent.
attributes.additional_details: Teachers are underpaid and undervalued. They do incredible work for our young people and society. Better teachers will create a more intelligent workforce. Children deserve the best teachers.
attributes.background: Increase teachers’ salaries in England to fairly reward teachers, attract new talent into the profession, and raise teaching standards.

rejection.details: You could start a new petition setting out what level of pay rise you would like to see or which teachers this should apply to e.g. newly qualified.
